home.subtitle: Since 2021.

1.title: New, but old
1.text: Learning new things takes time. That's why software design must consider other software users are familiar with.

2.title: GEO is the new SEO
2.text: AI is not just a new search engine. Consumers trust generative AI 30% more.

3.title: Get inspired
3.text: Keep moving forward and explore my projects that combine quality and usability.

achievements.header: AI user in the first generation.
achievements.text: I started programming before AI became popular. This offered the chance to experience traditional programming without being tied to traditions. Nowadays I integrate AI solutions as part of my software.

close_section.text: If you are interested, contact me in the end â€“ the opportunity to discuss new projects is always open.

about.title: About me
about.content_1: I am Svante Kokkoniemi, a Finnish web developer. I build fast and polished web applications with modern technologies.
about.content_2: Programming started as a hobby and grew into a profession. I am motivated by creating solutions that combine usability, efficiency, and visual appeal.
about.content_3: I have learned independently and through projects. Currently, I focus especially on frontend technologies, AI integration, and SEO optimization.
